posts.post_content:
I am condensing/revising previous threads, here, to focus on hall-of-famers for sale or trade.
Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [no pm's, please; my pm box is often full].
Ppff the same, [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [no messages], or regular paypal, add 3%.

Flat Rate $3 S/H, no matter how many cards you buy.  See other threads for more than 100 commons.  Discounts for combined shipping/multiple items.

Baker RC, $80,--SOLD--
Clarke, $52,--SOLD--
Bender, Sovereign 150 [Look at that lipstick! Paper-loss on back], $52,--SOLD--
Marquard portrait, $47,--SOLD--
McGraw, finger, $48,--SOLD--
Davis, $37,--SOLD--
McGraw portrait, no cap, $37,
McGinnity, $42,
McGinnity, $34
Huggins [pinholes in upper corners], $30--SOLD--
I'll take Marquard. Sending email now.
